artist: Artist: Katsushika Hokusai; Publisher: Published by Iseya Sanjirō
inscription: Yamazato wa/ fuyu zo sabishisa/ masarikeru/ hitome mo kusa mo/ karenu to omoeba 山里ハ　冬そさみしさ　まさりける　人目も草も　枯ぬと思へハ (In this mountain hamlet/ my loneliness grows/ deeper in winter./ Because I know there will be no visitors,/ and leaves and grasses wither.)
markings: censor seal: kiwame 極; publisher\'s seal: Eijudō 永寿堂
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: Saki no Hokusai Manji 前北斎卍
title: Poem by Minamoto no Muneyuki Ason
